name: MIS RESTRICTED Active Alerts Report Public Sector Prisons
description: v1.0 Displays a report of currently Active Alerts for the Public Sector Prison Service. Report categorises Alert Description (such as 'Bully', 'Escape List') and shows as a percentage of population. Report includes a tab for an Area Breakdown as well as National figures.

dataset.name: Query 1
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION, COUNT(DISTINCT (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) AS COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS') AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION IN ('East Midlands', 'Eastern', 'Kent and Sussex', 'London', 'North East', 'North West', 'South Central', 'South West', 'Wales', 'West Midlands', 'Yorkshire & Humberside') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_STATUS IN ('Active Out', 'Active In', 'Active In Transit', 'Active UAL'))) GROUP BY AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AREA_DESCRIPTION, COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Query 2
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION, COUNT(DISTINCT (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) AS COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS, CASE WHEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_TYPE_DESCRIPTION END AS ALERT_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_DESCRIPTION END AS ALERT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_ALERT AT_ALERT, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ALERT AT_OFFENDER_ALERT, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_ALERT.ALERT_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS') AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION IN ('East Midlands', 'Eastern', 'Kent and Sussex', 'London', 'North East', 'North West', 'South Central', 'South West', 'Wales', 'West Midlands', 'Yorkshire & Humberside') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_STATUS IN ('Active Out', 'Active In', 'Active In Transit', 'Active UAL')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_STATUS = 'ACTIVE')) GROUP BY AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_TYPE_DESCRIPTION END, CASE WHEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_DESCRIPTION END), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AREA_DESCRIPTION, COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS, ALERT_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION, ALERT_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

errors.error: Report field ALERT_DESCRIPTION does not have corresponding dataset schema field
